sentence.Network_en: Management and staff are at loggerheads over the plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 管理层和员工们对这个计划的看法存在严重分歧.

sentence.Network_en: Look here, you two , you're always at loggerheads. Mend it or end it.
sentence.Network_cn: 喂, 你们俩老是争吵. 要么握手言和,要么决裂算了.

sentence.Network_en: The North and South were at loggerheads.
sentence.Network_cn: 南北双方形成了剑拔弩张的紧张局势.

PerfectNetExp.abs: arthur and his wife are always at loggerheads ., 阿瑟和他的妻子总是合不来.
The situation is at loggerheads right now ., 现在的情形是发生争执.
Even trivial things can set Arthur and his wife loggerheads ., 即使是鸡毛蒜皮的小事也能使阿瑟和他妻子吵起来.
Mrs. Smith enjoys loggerheads ., 史密斯太太喜欢挑拨离间.

entry.tran: 争执不下；针锋相对；唱对台戏
entry.def: If two or more people or groups are at loggerheads, they disagree very strongly with each other.

example.ex: For months dentists and the health department have been at loggerheads over fees...
example.tran: 数月来，牙医和卫生部门为费用问题针锋相对。

example.ex: France was left isolated and at loggerheads with other EU member countries over its refusal to fall into line with demands to cut state borrowing.
example.tran: 法国与其他欧盟成员国要求削减国家借贷的意见相左，因而受到它们的孤立，与它们闹得不可开交。

auth_sentence.content: Iran and the international community have been at loggerheads over Tehran's nuclear program.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iran and the international community have been at loggerheads over Tehran's nuclear program.

sentences.en: Management and staff are at loggerheads over the plan.
sentences.cn: 管理层和员工们对这个计划的看法存在严重分歧。

sentences.en: The students are at loggerheads with the college over the price of food in the canteen.
sentences.cn: 学生们就食堂饭菜的价格问题和学院争执不休。
